post.title: Jewish degeneracy in a furry platformer

body:
Most will try to compartmentalize the ideas, separating furry from bestiality.  In fact, while there is a bestiality community inside the furry one (much like there is a fringe bestiality community in most of any society), the majority of furries find the idea of sexual contact with actual animals abhorrent.  

Furry would most likely be equivalent to Animistic religious fetishism.  (see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Animism#Non-human_animals).

By no means is this an attempt to excuse the deviant behaviour of either group.  Just personal study that I've found fascinating.

post.title: Jewish degeneracy in a furry platformer

body:
Unfortunately, no.  All they see are the dregs at inkbunny.com (one of the few sites that still allow "cub" or "underage" artwork).

What I find upsetting is that there is so much time and effort that is dedicated to the production of what amounts to child pornography and it's in the grey zone between what's morally repugnant and legislatively illegal.
